title.value: Data Standards Wales Message Events to Communicate a Patient's Medications List

description.value: A CodeSystem used for message events surrounding patient medications. Developed for use by NHS Wales Digital Medicines Transformation Programme to support the Shared Medicines Record

definition.value: Message to communicate a patient's medicines on admission
Message to communicate a patient's medicines on inpatient transfer (hospital to hospital/system to system)
Message to communicate a patient's medicines on discharge
Message to communicate a patient's medicines prescribed in outpatients (involves prescribing or medicines review actions)
